name: Shiki-Sama's Judgement
description:
Youmu is fed up with Yuyuko's bad habits, so she tries to ask Eiki if she can maybe reconsider her initial judgement and send her to hell instead (isn't that a bit harsh?). Then, danmaku happens.

Playable with either keyboard or controller!

Made in 3 days for the 2019 Touhou Fan Game Jam

Programming and Art: Fiore

Sounds: Fiore and Gubbles (for some reused sounds from our other project)

Touhou Project: ZUN
